snippet: Several football players recognized early on their potential power, and by Saturday night, they realized they possessed the leverage to exert it.
abstract: Players, staff and students recount events leading to decision by University of Missouri football team to boycott upcoming game unless university system president Tim Wolfe resigned.

byline.contributor: Steve Walentik contributed reporting from Columbia.

lead_paragraph: Several football players recognized early on their potential power, and by Saturday night, they realized they possessed the leverage to exert it.

headline.main: Off the Field, Charting the X’s and O’s of a Protest Movement
headline.print_headline: Charting the X’s and O’s of a Protest Movement
